special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The necromancer is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The necromancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): chill touch, dancing lights, mage hand, mending
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): chill touch, dancing lights, mage hand, mending

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots):false life*, mage armor, ray of sickness*
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots):false life*, mage armor, ray of sickness*

descriptions.raw: 2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness*, ray of enfeeblement*, web
descriptions.hyperlinked: 2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness*, ray of enfeeblement*, web

descriptions.raw: 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead*, bestow curse*, vampiric touch*
descriptions.hyperlinked: 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead*, bestow curse*, vampiric touch*

descriptions.raw: 4th level (3 slots): blight*, dimension door, stoneskin
descriptions.hyperlinked: 4th level (3 slots): blight*, dimension door, stoneskin

special_abilities.name: Grim Harvest (1/Turn).
descriptions: When necromancer kills a creature that is neither a construct nor undead with a spell of 1st level or higher, the necromancer regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level, or three times if it is a necromancy spell.

actions.name: Withering Touch.
descriptions: Melee Spell Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (2d4) necrotic damage.
